name: Example City District
description: Example City District is a district located in the Demo Region. The administrative center of the district is the urban-type settlement of Sampleville. Population: 12,345 (2023 estimate); 11,678 (2015 census results); 10,234 (2005 census results).

name: Exampleland
description: Exampleland, officially the Republic of Exampleland, is a fictional country used for demonstration purposes. It borders Placeholderia to the north, Samplestan to the east, and Mockistan to the south, with a coastline along the Imaginary Sea. Its capital is Mock City, and its largest city is Placeholder Town.
president: President: John Doe | Prime Minister: Jane Smith
